text: 4.11 Lom 12.7, 1 Ko 12.28, 2 Ti 4.5 Pen ne ke binɨb ne okok kɨlop dɨtep gɨl tap teplep anɨb okok ñak. Ogɨnap aglek, bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb wog ak gɨpal. Ogɨnap aglek, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb wog ak gɨpal. Ogɨnap aglek, bɨ God takaw teplep agñeb wog ak gɨpal. Ogɨnap aglek, kɨli Klays binɨb ne okok kɨlop kod mɨdɨl agñɨtep gep wog ak gɨpal.
